00036 void BoundingBox3DExtractor::computeBoundingBox(PointCloud3D* inputPointCloud, Point3D& resultBoxCenter, Vector3D& resultBoxDimensions) {
00037         lowerBound.setX(std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00038         lowerBound.setY(std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00039         lowerBound.setZ(std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00040         upperBound.setX(-std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00041         upperBound.setY(-std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00042         upperBound.setZ(-std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00043 
00044         /* get min/max */
00045         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i) {
00046                 Point3D* currentPoint;
00047                 currentPoint = &(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i];
00048 
00049                 /* adjust lower bound if necessary */
00050                 if (currentPoint->getX() <= lowerBound.getX()) {
00051                         lowerBound.setX(currentPoint->getX());
00052                 }
00053                 if (currentPoint->getY() <= lowerBound.getY()) {
00054                         lowerBound.setY(currentPoint->getY());
00055                 }
00056                 if (currentPoint->getZ() <= lowerBound.getZ()) {
00057                         lowerBound.setZ(currentPoint->getZ());
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 /* adjust upper bound if necessary */
00061                 if ( currentPoint->getX() >= upperBound.getX()) {
00062                         upperBound.setX(currentPoint->getX());
00063                 }
00064                 if      (currentPoint->getY() >= upperBound.getY()) {
00065                         upperBound.setY(currentPoint->getY());
00066                 }
00067                 if      (currentPoint->getZ() >= upperBound.getZ()) {
00068                         upperBound.setZ(currentPoint->getZ());
00069                 }
00070         }
00071 
00072         /* get centroid */
00073         Centroid3D centroidExtractor;
00074         Eigen::Vector3d centroid;
00075         centroid = centroidExtractor.computeCentroid(inputPointCloud);
00076         resultBoxCenter.setX(centroid[0]);
00077         resultBoxCenter.setY(centroid[1]);
00078         resultBoxCenter.setZ(centroid[2]);
00079 
00080         resultBoxDimensions.setX(fabs(upperBound.getX() - lowerBound.getX()));
00081         resultBoxDimensions.setY(fabs(upperBound.getY() - lowerBound.getY()));
00082         resultBoxDimensions.setZ(fabs(upperBound.getZ() - lowerBound.getZ()));
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 void BoundingBox3DExtractor::computeOrientedBoundingBox(PointCloud3D* inputPointCloud, IHomogeneousMatrix44* resultTransform, Vector3D& resultBoxDimensions) {
00087         assert(resultTransform != 0);
00088 
00089         lowerBound.setX(std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00090         lowerBound.setY(std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00091         lowerBound.setZ(std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00092         upperBound.setX(-std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00093         upperBound.setY(-std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00094         upperBound.setZ(-std::numeric_limits<brics_3d::Coordinate>::max());
00095 
00096         Eigen::MatrixXd eigenvectors;
00097         Eigen::VectorXd eigenvalues;
00098         pcaExtractor.computePrincipleComponents(inputPointCloud, eigenvectors, eigenvalues); //actually we compute a centroid twice...
00099         pcaExtractor.computeRotationMatrix(eigenvectors, eigenvalues, resultTransform);
00100 
00101         /* get min/max for PCA rotated points */
00102         HomogeneousMatrix44* inverseRotation = new HomogeneousMatrix44();
00103         *inverseRotation = *(resultTransform);
00104         inverseRotation->inverse();
00105         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i) {
00106                 Point3D tmpPoint = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i];
00107                 tmpPoint.homogeneousTransformation(inverseRotation); // move _all_ points to new frame
00108                 Point3D* currentPoint = &tmpPoint;
00109 
00110                 /* adjust lower bound if necessary */
00111                 if (currentPoint->getX() <= lowerBound.getX()) {
00112                         lowerBound.setX(currentPoint->getX());
00113                 }
00114                 if (currentPoint->getY() <= lowerBound.getY()) {
00115                         lowerBound.setY(currentPoint->getY());
00116                 }
00117                 if (currentPoint->getZ() <= lowerBound.getZ()) {
00118                         lowerBound.setZ(currentPoint->getZ());
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 /* adjust upper bound if necessary */
00122                 if ( currentPoint->getX() >= upperBound.getX()) {
00123                         upperBound.setX(currentPoint->getX());
00124                 }
00125                 if      (currentPoint->getY() >= upperBound.getY()) {
00126                         upperBound.setY(currentPoint->getY());
00127                 }
00128                 if      (currentPoint->getZ() >= upperBound.getZ()) {
00129                         upperBound.setZ(currentPoint->getZ());
00130                 }
00131         }
00132         delete inverseRotation;
00133 
00134         /* get centroid */
00135         Centroid3D centroidExtractor;
00136         Eigen::Vector3d centroid;
00137         centroid = centroidExtractor.computeCentroid(inputPointCloud);
00138 
00139         /* as centroid as translation */
00140         double* matrixData;
00141         matrixData = resultTransform->setRawData();
00142         matrixData[12] = centroid[0];
00143         matrixData[13] = centroid[1];
00144         matrixData[14] = centroid[2];
00145 
00146         LOG(DEBUG) << "Estimated transform for oriented bounding box: "<< std::endl << *resultTransform;
00147 
00148         resultBoxDimensions.setX(fabs(upperBound.getX() - lowerBound.getX()));
00149         resultBoxDimensions.setY(fabs(upperBound.getY() - lowerBound.getY()));
00150         resultBoxDimensions.setZ(fabs(upperBound.getZ() - lowerBound.getZ()));
00151 
00152 }
00153 
00154 }
